snippet: A pledge to create a central regulator has analysts asking whether the new agency would be given the power to rein in risky practices and hold banks accountable.
abstract: Announcement by European leaders that they will establish a centralized banking regulator is met with widespread doubt; analysts question whether the new agency will be given sufficient power and autonomy to resist the influence of regional political and regulatory forces that have hobbled similar efforts in the past.
lead_paragraph: A pledge to create a central regulator has analysts asking whether the new agency would be given the power to rein in risky practices and hold banks accountable.

headline.seo: Doubts Greet Plan for Euro Zone Bank Regulator
headline.main: Doubts Greet Plan for a New Euro Zone Bank Regulator
headline.print_headline: Doubts Greet Plan for a New Bank Regulator for the Euro Zone
